metadata.synopsis: The smith was knocked unconcious by Orin.  He comes to after Orin teleports away.  And walks towards the players.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1) Wait for Orin to teleport away.2) Smith will appear3) Triggers this dialog.

0.speaker: Gyldro Angleiron the Smith
0.text: Ungh... My head... All right, where are you?
0.context: NodeContext: Initially groggy as though just regaining consciousness. Then angry - storming out to find someone who attacked you
